novice.title: Responsive Landing Page
novice.desc: Design and code a landing page for a fictional product or service. Focus on making it responsive so it looks good on various devices and screen sizes. This project emphasizes responsive design principles and CSS media queries.

novice.title: Simple Blog
novice.desc: Create a blog platform where users can read and write blog posts. This project involves building a user interface for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, which reinforces CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.Create a blog platform where users can read and write blog posts.
